resources.string: Thumbs-UP App
Hello! Welcome to the Thumbs-UP App.
In this app, you will help us to test several thumb-reach-out techniques on your cell phone.
Please hold your cell phone with one hand and use the thumb of your holding hand to complete the tests.
Now choose your preferred hand to start:
First Test Instruction
This is the Instruction. In this app, you will help us to test several thumb-reach-out techniques on your cell phone.
Large Touch with Sliding Screen
Touch the screen with your preferred thumb for at least 1 second and slide the screen down to get the target circle closer to the thumb and select it.
Edge Trigger with sliding screen
Trigger the edge of your preferred hand and slide the screen down to get the target circle closer to the thumb and select it.
Large Touch with Screen Reduction
Touch the screen with your preferred thumb for at least 1 second and for the screen will reduced with 70% and will be near your preferred hand. Select the target to complete the trial.
Edge Trigger with Screen Reduction
Trigger the edge of your preferred hand and for the screen will reduced with 70% and will be near your preferred hand. Select the target to complete the trial.
Large Touch with Extendible Cursor
Touch the screen with your preferred thumb for at least 1 second and move the thumb in the opposite direction as your target till the generated cursor is reaches the target.
Edge Triger with Extendible Cursor
Trigger the edge of your preferred hand and move the thumb in the opposite direction as your target till the generated cursor is reaches the target.
Large Touch with Movable Cursor
Touch the screen with your preferred thumb for at least 1 second and the cursor will generate and will select the target.
Edge Trigger with Movable Cursor
Trigger the edge of your preferred hand and the cursor will generate and will select the target.
You have done all the tests.
